mapper.insert: insert into db_zhyexpress (SEQUENCEID, SHIPPINGCODE, SHIPPINGNAMECN, SHIPPINGNAMEEN, SHIPPINTIMGURL, 'STATUS', SHIPPINTADDRESS) values (#{sequenceid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{shippingcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shippingnamecn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shippingnameen,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shippintimgurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shippintaddress,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update db_zhyexpress set SHIPPINGCODE = #{shippingcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHIPPINGNAMECN = #{shippingnamecn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHIPPINGNAMEEN = #{shippingnameen,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHIPPINTIMGURL = #{shippintimgurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'STATUS' = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHIPPINTADDRESS = #{shippintaddress,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select SEQUENCEID, SHIPPINGCODE, SHIPPINGNAMECN, SHIPPINGNAMEEN, SHIPPINTIMGURL, 'STATUS', SHIPPINTADDRESS from db_zhyexpress where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
select SEQUENCEID, SHIPPINGCODE, SHIPPINGNAMECN, SHIPPINGNAMEEN, SHIPPINTIMGURL, 'STATUS', SHIPPINTADDRESS from db_zhyexpress
